ygData.subject: Re: runed totem?
ygData.msgSnippet: You are thinking of the Glowing Wooden Crook.  That staff is had by mages of level 20+.  It would sell for maybe 75pp.  Dont forget you are hitting for
ygData.messageBody:
You are thinking of the Glowing Wooden Crook. That staff is had by mages of
level 20+. It would sell for maybe 75pp. Dont forget you are hitting for
19points max with a totem staff and can hit Ghouls or any creatures
requireing magic to strike them. You get plus 5 hp and mana too. Anyway
,dont worry about it. Staff envy is had by all, but use what you got well
and you wont be dissapointed.

- Ziff

-----Original Message-----
From: Stacy Elliott [mailto:giles1066@...]
Sent: Saturday, May 01, 1999 10:45 AM
To: eq_wizards@onelist.com
Subject: [eq_wizards] Re: runed totem?


From: "Stacy Elliott" <giles1066@...>

Sounds like a case of STAFF envy.....


-----Original Message-----
From: Lim Dul <sevendegrees@...>
To: eq_wizards@onelist.com <eq_wizards@onelist.com>
Date: Thursday, April 29, 1999 3:06 PM
Subject: [eq_wizards] runed totem?


>From: "Lim Dul" <sevendegrees@...>
>
>I purchased a runed totem staff from somebody last night for 20pp. I
>was disappointed to find it was not the BIG staff I see some mages
>carry around. It looked no different from the cracked great staff
>or fine steel great staff I was using. The one I'm looking for has
>the crooked knot on top? Anybody know what that staff is?
>
>Don't get me wrong, the runed totem staff is great and I think I got a
>fairly good deal. But I've been jealously looking at other cool mages
>with this big staff in their hands. I've got a list of creatures I'd
>love to give a good WHACK on the backside to with this staff. :)
>
>Good day,
>-- LimDul
